connect.title: Connect to a SoulFire server
connect.description: Select which type of SoulFire server to connect to.

integrated.title: Integrated server (local)
integrated.description: Runs a SoulFire server on your computer. The setup is automatic and requires no configuration. (Requires the desktop app)

dedicated.title: Dedicated server (remote)
dedicated.description: Connects to a remote instance of the SoulFire server. You will need to provide the address and token of the server.

demo.title: Demo server
demo.description: Simulates a virtual server with demo data. This server is read-only and you cannot make any changes to it.

integrated.description: The integrated server runs locally on your PC. Configure the java startup arguments below if needed.

jvmArgs.title: JVM arguments
jvmArgs.description: The SoulFire Java VM arguments. To use 4GB of RAM, use <bold>-Xmx4G</bold>. Default is 25% of your RAM.

dedicated.description: Put in the address and token of the SoulFire server you want to connect to.

token.title: Token
token.description: Token to authenticate with the server.

emailCode.description: If you have an account, we have sent a code to <bold>{{email}}</bold>. Enter it below.
